reviews.text: Honest staff!!! My husband left his bag with important documents and a significant amount of cash at out  dinner table in the garden. Next morning, to our surprise, a member of the staff presented it to us! THANK you and BRAVO!

Clean hotel
Clean nicely decorated rooms clean bathroom

The coziest hotel we have ever been to. Having breakfast in a beautiful winter garden, served by a pleasant staff was priceless. The price for two nights is more than acceptable. Last but not least, the rooms are maintained clean, you feel relaxed and chilled just by entering them üòä
Very nice h√¥tel !  Stop looking elsewhere, this is the one you need! All aspect are really fine!

A cute and luxurious small hotel that is designed in a royal way, is about ten minutes drive from the center of Krakow. The service at the hotel is very good, the breakfast is small but tasty, the rooms are a bit small but they are excellent. It is very worth taking this hotel, thank you so much!
